inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP.`` Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican,'' Mike Pence tells us. I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. Then I started to hear the voice of a B-movie actor, turned governor, turned candidate. He gave voice to the ideals and values that I was raised to believe in.
